title: My Updates speech bubble link just goes to Boards Home?
body:
The only time I can actually go the the "My Update" page here is when I have like 30+ replies.

On the pbe boards, it goes there even when I have 0 replies.

Is there any way to reliably get to that page here or is this just some super long lasting bug?

replies.body: I noticed you submitted a ticket regarding this matter. Was Player Support able to resolve your issue, or are you still running into the same problem? This is definitely a new one for me, but I'd be happy to work with you to try to get this fixed.
I'm still running into it.  I only found your response because I reached the number of replies that allows me to reach the page again.
If you go to https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/myupdates , do you see the notifications?
Nope, it redirects me to https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/
If the page doesn't seem to be working appropriately, try clearing your browser cache.

Just tried and it didn't work :/
Thanks though.

I just click on it and it redirects to the home page.
I'm at a loss then. I think you should post this on the **Help & Support** board, and be detailed in your description so they understand what's happening.
